participant_1.background:
I want a place where I can feel safe and comfortable, and where I can be myself.
I loved watching my dog run around in the backyard.
I'm the only one in my family who has crazy hair.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.
I wake up early to make breakfast for my brother before he leaves for the army.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the simple life on my 5-acre property, spending my days writing and eating delicious food.
i have my own channel.
I often drop things because of my clumsiness, but I always clean up the mess and move on.
I have a lot of friends who love to cook and eat, so I love to share my coupon finds with them!
when people don t like my social media posts , it upsets me.

content.text: How has your day been?
It's been a little stressful lately, but I'm doing okay. How about yours?
It's been good! I woke up early and made breakfast for my brother before he left for the army.
That's really nice of you! My brother is in the army too.
I love spending time with my family. We're all really close.
I'm the only one in my family who has crazy hair.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to color my hair all different colors.
I think it would be really cool to have crazy hair.
It is! I love being able to express myself through my hair.
I love to cook and eat delicious food.
Same here! I love to try new recipes and make my own food.
I have a lot of friends who love to cook and eat, so I love to share my coupon finds with them!
That's really nice of you! I love finding good deals on food.
When people don t like my social media posts , it upsets me.
I know how you feel! It's always nice to get positive feedback on your posts.
I try not to let it get to me, but it can be hard sometimes.
It's definitely hard to ignore, but it's important to remember that not everyone is going to like everything you post.
You're right! I just need to focus on the people who do like my posts.
That's a good attitude!
Thanks for talking to me today! I feel a lot better.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
